Package aschmutz

Class WordtrainerBackend

java.lang.Object
aschmutz.WordtrainerBackend
public class WordtrainerBackend extends Object
The Backend of a Wordtrainer System. This is responsable for Managing the Wordpairs, and the in and output of them. Use a WordtrainerGui object in combination with a Backend to get a full Wordtrainer Game.

    • WordtrainerBackend

      public WordtrainerBackend(WordtrainerSaveManager saveManager, String path) throws IOException
      Creates a new instance of the WordtrainerBackend, and uses the given savemanager to initialise with the values stored on the file of the given path
      Parameters:
      saveManager - The Savemanager that is used for the initial load.
      path - The path from where the object will be loaded. It must not be null
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the path is null
      IOException

    • WordtrainerBackend

      Parameters:
      saveManager - The SaveManager that is to be set.

  • Method Details

    • load

      public void load(String path) throws IOException
      Loads the WordtrainerBackend from a given path. Uses the set WordtrainerSaveManager to load the WordtrainerBackend Object.
      Parameters:
      path - The path from where the object will be loaded.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the passed Argument for the path is NULL;
      IllegalStateException - If there is no WordtrainerSaveManager set, as this specifies the behaviour of the save functionality
      IOException - If the there are Problems with reading the File or if the file does not exist

    • save

      public void save(String path) throws IOException
      Saves the WordtrainerBackend to a given path. Uses the set WordtrainerSaveManager to save the WordtrainerBackend Object.
      Parameters:
      path - The path where the Object will be saved.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the passed Argument for the path is NULL;
      IllegalStateException - If there is no WordtrainerSaveManager set, as this specifies the behaviour of the save functionality
      IOException - If there are Problems when writing the File to Disk

    • setSaveManager

      public void setSaveManager(WordtrainerSaveManager saveManager)
      Sets the WordtrainerSaveManager that is used in the included Save and load Methodes of the WordtrainerBackend
      Parameters:
      saveManager - The saveManager that is to be set.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Compares two WordtrainerBackend with each other. Returns true if the statistics and all stored Wordtrainers are equal and have the same order. The Savemanager does not account to Equality.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - The WordtrainerBackend that is compared
      Returns:
      If the Object is Equal

      returns a Wordpair with a given ID
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the Wordpair ranges from 0 to length-1
      Returns:
      The Wordpair at a given ID

    • addWordpair

      public void addWordpair(Wordpair wordpair)
      Adds a wordpair to the WordtrainerBackend to be used in the GUI
      Parameters:

      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if null is passed

    • getStatistics

      public int getStatistics(StatType type)
      returns a statistic value from a given type
      Parameters:
      type - the Type of statistic that is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the value of the type that is requested
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If an unsopported StatType is passed

    • setStatistics

      public void setStatistics(int value, StatType type)
      sets the given statistics value. The Values are clamped at a minimum of 0, and only "correct" and "wrong" can be set
      Parameters:
      value - the Value that is to be set. as a Statistic value. It may not be smaller than 0. The value is clamped at 0 as a minimum
      type - the Type of statistic that is to be set. It can only be "correct" or "wrong" as the rest is calculated out of that.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - The Stat Type can only be "correct" or "wrong", other wise an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.

    • getWordpairs

      public Wordpair[] getWordpairs()
      Returns all the Wordpairs that are stored in that WordtrainerBackend.
      Returns:
      The stored Wordpairs as an Array. The individual Wordpairs are not guaranteed to match in referencce.

    • removeWordpair

      public Wordpair removeWordpair(int id)
      Removes a Wordpair from the WordtrainerBackend, and Shifftes the IDs accordingliy
      Parameters:
      id - the of the Id that is to be deleted
      Returns:
      The Removed wordpair
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Is thrown when the ID that is to be deleted does not exist in the WordtrainerBackend.
